settings.code:
<style>
#shopify-section-template--18578640503132__page_video{
    display: block;
}
#shopify-section-template--18578640503132__m_page_video{
    display: none;
}
#shopify-section-template--18578640503132__m_page_video .t4s-btn-icon use,#shopify-section-template--18578640503132__page_video .t4s-btn-icon use{
display: none;
}
#shopify-section-template--18578640503132__m_page_video .t4s-btn-icon,#shopify-section-template--18578640503132__page_video .t4s-btn-icon{
    background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/e6ea41caa8eabf7c36ef13dc76fb9fdb_98317435-77c4-4a96-a683-f9125e4506e2.png?v=1681786017') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
}

 /* Top Buy */
 .top_buy {
    position: absolute;
    top: 100px;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 1;
}

.top_buy .top_content {
    max-width: 69.792vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
    border-bottom: 0.052vw solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    padding: 0.521vw 0;
}

.top_buy .top_content p {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.09375vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin: 0;
}
.top_buy .top_content .rigth{
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}
.top_buy .top_content .rigth span {
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin-right: 1.302vw;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth span:hover {
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #D2D2D7;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth span.active {
    color: #D2D2D7;
}

.top_buy .top_content .rigth a{
    display: inline-block;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #000000;
    width: 2.34375vw;
    height: 1.25vw;
    line-height: 1.25vw;
    background: #03F2A6;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 1.5625vw;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}
.top_buy .top_content .rigth a:hover{
    background: #00cc88;
}
.top_50 {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0!important;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    border-bottom: 0.052vw solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
    animation: top-animeit .5s linear;
    z-index: 999;
}
@keyframes top-animeit {
    0% {
        transform: translateY(-100%);
    }
    100% {
        transform: translateY(0);
    }
}
.top_50 .top_content {
    border: none;
    max-width:66.667vw;
}
/* form */
.SignUp{
    background: #151517;
}
.SignUp .section_box{
    max-width: 42.1875vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 6.25vw 0;
}
  .SignUp h3 {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 2.5vw;
    line-height: 2.708vw;
    color: #ffffff;
    margin-bottom: 1.823vw;
  }
  .SignUp .form-col-wrap{
    width: 34.896vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
  
  .Powerroam_form{
    position: relative;
  }
  .Powerroam_form img{
    position: absolute;
    left: 1.302vw;
    top: 50%;
    transform: translateY(-50%);
    width: 1.458vw;

  }
  .Powerroam_form .Polaris-FormLayout {
   width: 100%;
  }
  .Powerroam_form > .element-group{
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
  }
  .Powerroam_form .Polaris-FormLayout input {
    width: 100%;
    font-weight: 400;
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    color: #A1A1A6;
    height: 2.8125vw;
    border: 0.052vw solid #FFFFFF;
    border-radius: 2.083vw;
    padding: 0 0 0 3.438vw;
    background: none;
  }
  
  .Powerroam_form .form-submit-btn-wrap button {
    width: 5.885vw;
    height: 2.8125vw;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.885vw;
    color: #000000;
    background: #03F2A6;
    border-radius: 2.083vw;
    padding: 0;
  }
  .Powerroam_form .form-submit-btn-wrap button:hover {
    background: #00cc88;
  }
.Powerroam_form .alert-success {
    color: green;
    position: absolute;
    font-size: 0.729vw;
    top: 3.646vw;
    width: 36.979vw;
    left: -30.990vw;
  }
.section_1{
    padding: 6.25vw 0 12.5vw 0;
    background: #000;
    width: 100%;
    overflow: hidden;
}
.section_1 .section_box{
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 45.3125vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.section_1 .section_box .bg_swiper{
    position: relative;
}
.section_1 .item{
    width: 100%;
    opacity: .6;
}
.section_1 .item.swiper-slide-active{
    opacity: 1;
}
.section_1 .item .text{
    margin-bottom: 2.34375vw;
    opacity: 0;
}
.section_1 .item.swiper-slide-active .text{
    opacity: 1;
}
.section_1 .item .text span{
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    color: #03F2A6;
}
.section_1 .item .text h2{
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 2.5vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin: 0.521vw 0 0.78125vw 0;
}
.section_1 .item .text p{
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    line-height: 1.042vw;
    color: #A1A1A6;
    padding-right: 10%;
    height: 2.083vw;
}
.section_1 .cursor_btns{
    max-width: 36.458vw;
    margin-top: 2.083vw;
    
}
.section_1 .cursor_btns span{
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    color: #949499;
    padding:0 0 0.521vw 0;
    border-bottom: 0.052vw solid #A1A1A6;
    text-align: center;
}
.section_1 .cursor_btns span:nth-child(1){
    padding-left: 0;
}
.section_1 .cursor_btns span:last-child{
    padding-right: 0;
}
.section_1 .cursor_btns span:hover,.section_1 .cursor_btns span.swiper-slide-thumb-active{
    cursor: pointer;
    color: #03F2A6;
    border-bottom: 0.052vw solid #03F2A6;
}
.section_2,.section_3{
    background-color: #000;
}
.section_2 .sction_box{
    max-width: 49.479vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item:nth-child(even) .text{
    order: 1;
    margin: 0 0 0 2.865vw;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item{
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: nowrap;
    padding-bottom: 12.5vw;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item .text{
    margin: 0 2.865vw 0 0;
    max-width: 19.010vw;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item .text h2{
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.875vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    line-height: 2.083vw;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item .text p{
    font-size: 1.042vw;
    line-height: 1.25vw;
    color: #A1A1A6;
    margin: 2.083vw 0 2.604vw 0;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item .text a{
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 0.625vw 0;
    width: 8.59375vw;
    background: #03F2A6;
    border-radius: 3.125vw;
    transition: .4s;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item .text a:hover{
    background: #00cc88;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item .text a span{
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: #000000;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item .text a .icon{
    max-width: 0.78125vw;
    max-height: 0.78125vw;
}
.section_2 .sction_box .item > a{
    display: none;
}
.section_3 .section_box{
    text-align: center;
}
.section_3 .section_box h2{
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 3.333vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin-bottom: 4.583vw;
}
.section_3 .section_box img{
    width: 56.667vw;
}
/* specs */
.specs {
    background: #000000;
    padding: 0 0 6.25vw 0;
}

.specs_box {
    max-width: 66.667vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

.specs_box .bottom_p p{
    font-size: 0.625vw;
    line-height: 0.833vw;
    color: #86868B;
    padding: 3.125vw 0 1vw 0;
    margin: 0;
}

.specs_box ul {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.specs_box .item ul {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    justify-content: flex-start;
    padding: 3.125vw 0;
    border-bottom: 0.052vw solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
}

.specs_box .item ul li {
    width: 37%;
}

.specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) {
    width: 26%;
}
.specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul{
    padding-top: 0;
}
.specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li {
    width: 35%;
}

.specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(1) {
    width: 15%;
}

.specs_box .item ul li p,
.specs_box .item ul li span {
    font-size: 0.885vw;
    color: #A1A1A6;
    margin: 0;
}

.specs_box .item ul li div {
    padding-bottom: 1.042vw;
}

.specs_box .item ul li span {
    font-weight: 600;
}

.specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) p {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
}

.specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2),
.specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) {
    text-align: center;
}

.specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) p,
.specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) p {
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.667vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin-bottom: 3.125vw;
    margin-top: -0.78125vw;
}

.specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) img {
    max-width: 11.458vw;
}

.specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) img {
    max-width: 10.417vw;
}

.specs_box .item:last-child ul{
    padding: 0;
    border: none;
}
.specs_box .item:last-child ul li:nth-child(1){
    border: 0;
    padding: 0;
}
 .specs_box .item:last-child ul a{
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 0.625vw 1.25vw;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    border-radius: 3.125vw;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    color: #000000;
    transition: .4s;
}
.specs_box .item:last-child ul a:hover{
    background: #03F2A6;
}
@media (max-width:1440px) {
    .top_buy .top_content{
        max-width: 93vw;
    }
}
@media (max-width:768px) {
    #shopify-section-template--18578640503132__page_video{
        display: none;
    }
    #shopify-section-template--18578640503132__m_page_video{
        display: block;
    }
    /* form */
    .SignUp .section_box{
        max-width: 100%;
        padding: 18.133vw 5.333vw;
    }
    .SignUp .form-col-wrap{
        width: 100%;
    }
    .SignUp h3{
        font-size: 5.867vw;
        line-height: 8vw;
        margin-bottom: 9.333vw;
    }
    .Powerroam_form img{
        left: 6.667vw;
        width: 7.467vw;
        top: 20%;
    }
    .Powerroam_form .Polaris-FormLayout input{
        font-size: 4.267vw;
        height: 13.867vw;
        border-radius: 10.667vw;
        padding: 0 0 0 17.600vw;
        border: 0.267vw solid #FFFFFF;
    }
    .Powerroam_form > .element-group{
        position: relative;
        margin-top: 5.333vw;
    }
    .Powerroam_form .form-submit-btn-wrap button{
        width: 100%;
        height: 13.867vw;
        border-radius: 10.667vw;
        font-size: 4.533vw;
    }
    .Powerroam_form .alert-success{
        font-size: 2.729vw;
        top: 16.646vw;
        width: 90.979vw;
        left: 0;
    }
    /* Top Buy */
    .top_buy{
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
    }
    .top_buy .top_content {
        max-width: 100%;
        padding: 4vw 5.333vw;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content p {
        font-size: 5.067vw;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content span {
        margin-right: 2.667vw;
        font-size: 3.2vw;
    }

    .top_buy .top_content .rigth a {
        width: 12vw;
        height: 6.4vw;
        border-radius: 8vw;
        line-height: 6.4vw;
        font-size: 3.2vw;
    }
    /* .banner_box{
        top: 50%;
        left: 0;
        transform: translateY(-50%);
        padding: 0 10.667vw;
    }
    .banner_box h1{
        font-size: 12.8vw;
        line-height: 13.867vw;
    }
    .banner_box p{
        font-size: 6.4vw;
        line-height: 7.467vw;
        margin: 2.667vw auto 9.333vw auto;;
        max-width: 61.333vw;
    }
    .banner_box a{
        font-size: 4.533vw;
        padding: 2.667vw 0;
        width: 44.533vw;
        border: 0.533vw solid #FFFFFF;
    }
    .banner_box a img{
        width: 5.333vw;
        height: 5.333vw;
        margin-left: 2.133vw;
    } */
    .section_1{
        padding: 16vw 0 32vw 0;
    }
    .section_1 .section_box{
        max-width: 100%;
    }
    .section_1 .item{
        padding: 0 5.333vw;
    }
    .section_1 .item .text{
        margin-bottom: 10.667vw;
    }
    .section_1 .item .text span{
        font-size: 4.267vw;
    }
    .section_1 .item .text h2{
        font-size: 9.6vw;
        margin: 1.333vw 0 2.667vw 0;
        line-height: 10.667vw;
    }
    .section_1 .item .text p{
        font-size: 3.733vw;
        line-height: 4.8vw;
        height: 16vw;
    }
    .section_1 .cursor_btns{
        margin: 5.333vw 0 0 5.333vw;
        max-width: 100%;
    }
    .section_1 .cursor_btns span{
        font-size: 3.733vw;
        border-bottom: 0.267vw solid #A1A1A6;
        padding-bottom: 2.667vw;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box{
        max-width: 100%;
        padding: 0 5.333vw;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box .item{
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        padding-bottom: 32vw;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box .item .text{
        margin: 0;
        max-width: 100%;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box .item .text h2{
        font-size: 9.6vw;
        line-height: 10.667vw;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box .item .text p{
        font-size: 3.733vw;
        line-height: 4.8vw;
        margin: 4vw 0 8vw 0;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box .item .text a{
        display: none;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box .item > a{
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        padding: 3.2vw 0;
        width: 42.667vw;
        background: #03F2A6;
        border-radius: 16vw;
        margin: 9.333vw auto 0 auto;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box .item > a span{
        font-size: 4.267vw;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: #000000;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box .item > a .icon{
        max-width: 4vw;
        max-height: 4vw;
    }
    .section_2 .sction_box .item:nth-child(even) .text{
        order: 0;
        margin: 0;
    }
    .section_3 .section_box{
        padding: 0 5.333vw;
    }
    .section_3 .section_box h2{
        font-size: 8.533vw;
        line-height: 10.667vw;
        margin-bottom: 8vw;
    }
    .section_3 .section_box img{
        width: 100%;
    }
    /* specs */
 .specs_box {
    padding: 0 5.333vw;
    max-width: 100%;
    }
   
    .specs_box .bottom_p p {
    font-size: 3.2vw;
    line-height: 4.267vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    padding: 6.667vw 0;
    border: none;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li,
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li {
    width: 50%;
    padding: 5.333vw 1vw;
    }
    
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(1){
        display: none;
    }
    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1){
    width: 100%;
    border-bottom: 0.267vw solid #424245;
    padding: 0 0 5.333vw 0;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) p {
    font-size: 5.600vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) p,
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) p {
    font-size: 4.267vw;
    margin: 0 0 9.333vw 0;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) img {
    max-width: 35.333vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) img {
    max-width: 32.667vw;
    }
   
    .specs_box .item ul li p,
    .specs_box .item ul li span {
    font-size: 4.533vw;
    }
    .specs_box .item:last-child ul a{
       padding: 2.667vw 5.333vw;
       font-weight: 600;
       font-size: 3vw;
       color: #000000;
       border-radius: 16vw;
    }
}
</style>

settings.text: Empower your life, Roam the world.
Empower your life, Roam the world.

settings.code:
PowerRoam

Compare Buy

Sign Up to Get Free Gifts with the Purchase of PowerRoam

0-80%in 50mins*

PowerZip Technology

1. Connected to an AC outlet, PowerZip technology gets the PowerRoam to 80% battery in 50minutes and 100% in 1.5 hours.

Empower Adaptability

U-Turbo Technology

U-Turbo Technology's built-in advanced algorithm lowers voltageenabling heavy-duty devices use below 2500W.

3000 cycles

EV-Rated Battery

EV-Rated batteries coupled with BMS allowour units to run 3,000 cycles to 80% capacity.

Matching solar panels

Fast Solar Charging

Max 400W Solar Charging, Fully Charge in 3 Hours.

Control Power Remotely

Super Easy App Control

Use the PowerRoam app to control from remote instinctively, just that easy. Child Lock function is specially designed for your kids.

PowerZip U-Turbo EV-Rated Battery Solar Panel App Control

Unleash Your Wild

Keep energized for any outdoor scenario with 1200 watts of output power and a 1024Wh battery capacity. Elevate your outdoor lifestyle with Ugreen solar panels, and fully release your inner outdoorsman.

Learn More
Learn More

Upgrade Weekend Away Camping

The PowerRoam 600W is a smaller, lighter power station with a superb 680Wh battery capacity. Perfect for short camping jaunts, weekends in the wilderness, pop-up photo shoots, or outdoor social events. Portable power for any situation!
